ISSUE.TITLE: Ensure that _ViewImports.cshtml files are identical for \Views and a default theme
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.0 The \Views\_ViewStart.cshtml and \Themes\DefaultClean\Views\_ViewStart.cshtml are different now. Hence view overrrides don't work by default in some somes (required additional override of the \Themes\DefaultClean\Views\_ViewStart.cshtml file) Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/96023/46-custom-view-not-working-when-moved-into-skin-folder
